pages.text: By applying the cleansing powers of $(marked)Birch$(), the $(marked)Purity$() effect can weaken the effects of harmful potions.$(br2)For each intensity, this potion will reduce the power of a negative potion, also reducing its own power.

pages.title: Purity
pages.text: In concrete terms, this means that you can remove more negative potion effects the stronger the potion is.
